mechanics.trigger: Creature attempts to cross cylinder boundary
mechanics.condition: Creature is of chosen type AND Creature attempts to cross boundary willingly AND By nonmagical means AND ((Spell is normal mode AND Creature attempts to enter cylinder) OR (Spell is reverse mode AND Creature attempts to leave cylinder))

mechanics.trigger: Creature attempts to cross cylinder boundary
mechanics.condition: Creature is of chosen type AND Creature attempts to cross boundary willingly AND By magical means (e.g., teleportation or interplanar travel) AND ((Spell is normal mode AND Creature attempts to enter cylinder) OR (Spell is reverse mode AND Creature attempts to leave cylinder))
mechanics.outcome: Creature must succeed on a Charisma saving throw to cross boundary

mechanics.trigger: Creature of chosen type makes an attack roll
mechanics.condition: Creature is of chosen type AND ((Spell is normal mode AND Creature is outside cylinder AND target is inside cylinder) OR (Spell is reverse mode AND Creature is inside cylinder AND target is outside cylinder))

mechanics.trigger: Creature of chosen type attempts to charm, frighten, or possess a target
mechanics.condition: Creature is of chosen type AND ((Spell is normal mode AND Creature is outside cylinder AND target is inside cylinder) OR (Spell is reverse mode AND Creature is inside cylinder AND target is outside cylinder))
mechanics.outcome: Target is immune to being charmed, frightened, or possessed by that creature

description_text: You create a 10-foot radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range. Glowing runes appear whenever the cylinder intersects with the floor or other surface.Choose one or more of the following types of creatures: celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead. The circle affects a creature of the chosen type in the following ways:The creature can't willingly enter the cylinder by nonmagical means. If the creature tries to use teleportation or interplanar travel to do so, it must first succeed on a charisma saving throw.The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets within the cylinder.Targets within the cylinder can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed by the creature.When you cast this spell, you can elect to cause its magic to operate in the reverse direction, preventing a creature of the specified type from leaving the cylinder and protecting targets outside it.
